snippet: The regulator for Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac slashed salaries for the chief executives of the two agencies and ruled out bonuses for many top executives.
abstract: Federal Housing Finance Agency, regulator for Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, slashes salaries for the chief executives of the two agencies and rules out bonuses for many top executives.
lead_paragraph: The regulator for Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac slashed salaries for the chief executives of the two agencies and ruled out bonuses for many top executives.

headline.main: Executive Pay Capped at Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac
headline.print_headline: Executive Pay Capped at Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac
